item.title: Pokemon Gen 10 Starter Details Leak Online
item.description:
This article contains possible spoilers for Pokemon Gen 10

New details regarding Pokemon Gen 10 , expected to be properly revealed at Pokemon Day in February 2026, have leaked online, and one of the new details reveals how players will unlock their starter. Shared by Twitter user Centro Leaks, who has accurately shared leaks in the past, Pokemon Gen 10 begins with players in a big city instead of a small stone, which is key to how players unlock their starters.

Pokemon Gen 10 Leaks at a Glance

  • Pokemon Wind and Waves
  • Central themes are Infinity and Parental Responsibility for their Children
  • Based on Southeast Asia and Indonesia
  • New Baby Pokemon (including one with "infinite forms")
  • Weather Moves are the new Battle Gimmick
  • Exclusive to Switch 2
  • There could be lite live-service or procedural generation features

If the leaks are true, Pokemon Gen 10 will be called Pokemon Winds and Waves . It's worth noting that this isn't the first time this name has circulated online, but it is accompanied by several more details this time around. The theme of the generation is allegedly "infinity," with parents seeking to leave a better world behind for their children. The region is based on Southeast Asia and Indonesia, not Greece as mentioned previously in Pokemon Gen 10 rumors and leaks. Alongside details about Baby Pokemon, NPCs, new gameplay features (the gimmick being "Weather Moves"), and Switch 2 exclusivity is some fun new information regarding the starters.

Pokemon Gen 10 Starter Leak: Catch 'Em!

According to Centro Leaks, the documents do not contain descriptions of the new starters, but it does reveal how players will obtain them. It seems players (alongside their in-game mother) unlock a vacation where they travel to a specific island and head to a hotel (which may also serve as a hub/lobby for Pokemon Gen 10 players). However, they realize that the city streets have become completely jammed by traffic, as Pokemon have seemingly escaped and are blocking the roads. Someone, although it is not specified who, asks the player to catch the Pokemon for them. It would presumably be the professor, who is said to be a survivalist studying weather effects, but that is unknown as of this writing.

While the exact starters are unknown, fans can expect the standard trio of Fire, Water, and Grass-type starters. Pokemon Gen 10 seems to be changing up some details, including elements of procedural generation, for example, but it's doubtful that it will move away from its core. Furthermore, this type of start is central to the question of what parents leave behind for their children, so the cohesiveness adds to the credibility of these leaks, especially in conjunction with the source.

Of course, all rumors and leaks should be taken with a grain of salt. These leaks may prove true, they may prove false, or they could be older information that changed sometime throughout development. However, with Riddler Khu also supporting Centro Leaks' claim that the Pokemon Gen 10 setting is Southeast Asia and Indonesia, it's the strongest information fans can likely expect until Pokemon Day.

item.title: Upload Labs: Beginner Tips & Tricks
item.description:
If you’ve ever dreamed of peeking inside a computer’s guts and tinkering with its hidden systems, Upload Labs brings you exactly that experience. Upload Labs is a free sci-fi management game where you build, optimize, and evolve a sprawling digital network of nodes to download, process, and upload files at the speed of light. With brain-melting puzzles, Upload Labs feels really chaotic. If you’re just starting out, this guide will walk you through the best beginner tips to help you.

11 Upgrade Your Network Early

Your network is the heartbeat of your entire operation. Every byte of data flowing between nodes depends on it, and if your network is slow, everything is slow. This includes downloads, uploads, and profits.

In the early game, your first priority should be pouring money into network upgrades. The network level determines how quickly your data moves between nodes, which directly affects how much money you make per second. If your uploads and downloads start becoming slow, that’s your cue to invest in a network upgrade.

The moment your income begins to plateau, check your network level. Make sure to upgrade your network frequently.

10 Image Downloaders Are Your Best Friend

At the start, you will only get to work with text downloaders. These are the simplest, smallest, and least profitable nodes in Upload Labs . They’re great for learning the ropes, but they won’t take you far. The first major goal you should set for yourself is unlocking Image Downloaders. Image files generate far more money than text files. They give you the boost you need to scale your setup quickly.

Don’t make the rookie mistake of flooding your system with too many downloaders too fast. Every new downloader divides your total network speed among them. For example, three uploaders working at 21 seconds each and four at 16 seconds will yield about the same overall income, meaning more isn’t always better.

9 Use the Virus Scanner Strategically

The Virus Scanner is one of the most underrated yet powerful tools in Upload Labs , especially in the early game. Once you unlock the Processor, you’ll also get access to the Virus Scanner node. This small tool multiplies the money you earn from text files by four times. For something so early in the progression tree, this is an enormous boost.

Although setting it up may seem pricey at first, the investment returns are pretty quick. The Virus Scanner is like a money printer that also cleans up your network. Plus, it also clears harmful processes that can slow your uploads and reduce efficiency. So, make sure to run the Virus Scanner frequently, especially after major expansions. It’ll keep your entire system running smoother.

8 Actively Collect Orange Tokens and Spend Them Wisely

As you play, you’ll notice small orange circles, called Tokens, popping up every now and then on your screen. Make sure to grab them whenever you can. They’re a secondary currency that you can use to buy quality-of-life upgrades in the shop.

You can also earn these Tokens by completing achievements. In the early game, focus on saving Tokens for permanent upgrades. These are things that will improve your efficiency or system capacity long-term. Once you’re comfortably generating Tokens later on, then you can splurge on boosts.

7 Organize Your System With Folders

As your lab grows, things will get messy fast. Before long, your screen will turn into a tangled web of connections. That’s where Folders come to the rescue. Folders let you consolidate multiple outputs into one neat, manageable node.

Instead of routing several Virus Scanner outputs individually, you can compress them into a single export node. This not only makes your setup visually cleaner but also reduces bandwidth usage and improves system performance. Folders are one of the most important quality-of-life tools in Upload Labs .

6 Purchase the Auto Collector As Soon As Possible

The Auto Collector is one of the most valuable early upgrades you can buy in Upload Labs . For just 40 Tokens, it unlocks a powerful automation feature that automatically gathers all your Cash and other resources.

In the early game, your Collector just lets the cash accumulate, which you can then click to claim. The Auto Collector removes this manual step entirely. This way, you never miss out on any resources, even when you’re busy optimizing your setup. It’s a massive quality-of-life upgrade that saves time and boosts efficiency in the long run.

5 Look for Synergies Between Nodes

One of Upload Labs’ most fascinating mechanics is the way certain nodes work better when paired together. For instance, some data generators perform best when connected to compatible processors or single uploaders. Experiment with different designs here to find the best layout.

You can try linking different node types to find out which combinations yield the highest revenue. Sometimes, the right connection between two nodes can double your performance without spending a single extra coin.

4 Keep Your Node Layout Clean

Just as good cable management is important for an organized PC build, it is for Upload Labs , too. As your system grows, keeping a clean, logical layout becomes really important. What you can do is, use the game’s built-in grid system to your advantage. Try organizing nodes in square formations or clean lines that make logical sense. For example, downloaders on one side, processors in the middle, and uploaders at the end.

A neat layout isn’t just easier on the eyes; it makes spotting inefficiencies so much simpler. When your network becomes a tangle of random connections, identifying bottlenecks becomes a nightmare.

Don’t get attached to your old systems. If a section of your network feels outdated, tear it down and start over. The most successful players constantly refine their setups, removing unnecessary complexity and streamlining their data flow.

3 Don’t Ignore Bandwidth Optimization

In Upload Labs , Bandwidth functions like power management in other simulation games. Every node consumes part of your network’s total speed, and if you’re not careful, you’ll waste valuable bandwidth on low-yield connections. Make it a habit to review your network and adjust which nodes receive priority regularly. Try to give more bandwidth to your most profitable nodes. The trick is to keep everything flowing smoothly without starving critical nodes of resources.

2 Invest in Crypto Early

In Upload Labs , crypto mining is a function tied to the GPU node. At first, crypto mining might seem like a small side feature, but it can become a steady passive income stream if you manage it wisely. Once your GPU is active, make sure it’s properly connected to your Crypto Seller node. This is where your mined LiteCoin automatically gets converted into usable cash. The key is to keep your GPU upgraded regularly, since higher-level GPUs mine faster and yield more profits over time.

item.title: Battlefield 6 Engineers Have Developed Their Own Soulslike System
item.description:
Battlefield 6 has made its way onto the scene, and it's proving to be a hit among both longtime fans of the series and FPS lovers in general. The hype surrounding Battlefield 6 has given the game some massive expectations to live up to, and thankfully, its launch weekend has been able to stick the landing.

When it comes to multiplayer matches, most players have their specific class preferences, and the Engineer class is one of the game's most useful roles, as these players are tasked with repairing vehicles while also taking down enemy ones. Engineers have some great tools at their disposal, but one of the most important is a handy blowtorch aptly named the Repair Tool. This item is usually utilized for fixing things, but some Engineers have been using it in a way that feels like it's been taken straight from the Soulslike playbook.

Battlefield 6's Engineers Are Leaving Soulslike-esque Messages During Matches

  • Engineers are using the Repair Tool to communicate funny messages to other players.
  • A player-to-player messaging system is a defining characteristic of FromSoftware's Soulslike games.

When Demon's Souls was released back in 2009, developer FromSoftware made waves with its own brand of in-game messaging. Although Demon's Souls was mainly intended as a single-player experience, the game's online components brought forth a fun messaging system that continues to be a signature part of many of FromSofware's projects. Demon's Souls kickstarted the Soulslike genre, and since then, players have continued to leave messages for others, whether it be Elden Ring or Dark Souls . Battlefield 6 's features may not actually include a full-blown Soulslike messaging system, but the approach being taken by some Engineers definitely feels reminiscent.

Like this post from Reddit user Beningham94, others Engineers have been communicating with cheeky messages. Whether it's a statement about medics or NSFW messages (and there are many), the Engineer-specific tool has paved the way for players to communicate in a way that isn't intrusive but still gets the messages across. Battlefield 6 's multiplayer maps can easily be turned into billboards because of the torch, and it sets the stage for some hilariously absurd reminders.

Messages like, "Remember to revive your teammates" are both amusingly passive-aggressive and solid advice, and it's a simple, but effective, way to remind players how important teamwork is in Battlefield 6 . It's an essential part of the experience, and for newcomers who may not be aware, these Engineer messages could be a solid teaching method.

Battlefield 6 's features may not actually include a full-blown Soulslike messaging system, but the approach being taken by some Engineers definitely feels reminiscent.

Battlefield 6 is Off to a Massive Start

  • Battlefield 6 has dominated the sales charts.
  • The game made $100 million on its first day on Steam.
  • On launch day, the Steam peak player count was over 700,000 participants.

Leading up to the game's launch, the anticipation for Battlefield 6 was at an all-time high, and the FPS title has come out swinging. The history of the Battlefield franchise hasn't always been smooth sailing, and even though Battlefield 6 isn't perfect, it's a fantastic action-packed return to its roots. With its main competitor, Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 , right around the corner, it looks like Battlefield 6 may have a leg up on the competition, at least for now.

Despite the strong launch numbers, Battlefield 6 's opening weekend still had issues with long queue times, EA App problems, and cheaters.

Of course, only time will tell which title comes out on top, but Battlefield 6 and Black Ops 7 closing out the year with a head-to-head showdown is a thrilling way to end 2025. Regardless, Battlefield 6 has proven to be one of the biggest launches of the year, so far, and it will be fascinating to see what the game has in store in its first year.

12
8.5 /10
9 /10

Battlefield 6

item.title: Best EXP Farm for Level 99 in Digimon Story Time Stranger
item.description:
While players will accumulate quite a lot of EXP as they work through Digimon Story: Time Stranger 's main and side missions, they will need to do so farming if they hope to get their Digimon to Level 99 and maximum cumulative stats. Fortunately, there are some great methods for farming EXP in the late game. This guide explains how to pursue three such methods, and it will help players max out their Digimon in Digimon Story: Time Stranger .

As noted, the EXP farming strategies detailed in this guide are intended for players in the late game who want to perfect their Digimon for the final battles and Time Stranger 's New Game Plus mode. It also assumes that the reader has not purchased the Outer Dungeons The Halls of EXP DLC, as the area contained within that DLC is the best option overall.

Best EXP Farming Methods in Digimon Story Time Stranger

AFK Method

While there are faster ways to earn EXP in Digimon Story Time Stranger , this method is noteworthy because it can be pursued without any input from the player. Indeed, players who follow these steps can level up their Digimon while they are entirely away from the game:

  1. Travel to the Cosmic Area - Present Day .
  2. Navigate to the Heat side, and make your way to the third map ( Heat Cosmic: Whiteflame Area ).
  3. Stand on the path so that the MudFrigimon roll into you.
  4. Turn Auto Battle on.

Players will now find that they are repeatedly put into combat with MudFrigimon, and the Auto Battle feature will take care of the rest. Notably, MudFrigimon are vulnerable to Vaccine, Leaf, and Water, and players who want to make the most of this AFK farm are advised to fill their parties with Digimon that have that attribute and access to those types of attacks.

A similar setup can also be established with the rolling Penmon on the Frost side of the Cosmic Area.

Infinite Ankylomon Method

With a bit of setup, Time Stranger players can create as many Ankylomon as they wish, which they can then load into the Digimon that they want to take to Level 99. The first part of this setup centers around unlocking Shakkoumon in the Field Guide , and here is an easy way to do that:

  1. Get an Ankylomon . To get an Ankylomon, head to the Shinjuku Underground Waterway: North Block, convert a Tokomon, digivolve to Armadillomon, then digivolve to Ankylomon.
  2. Get an Angemon . To get an Angemon, head to the Shinjuku Underground Waterway: North Block, convert a Tokomon, digivolve to Patamon, then digivolve to Angemon.
  3. Make sure the Angemon has an Enlightened personality. If it does not, use Time Stranger 's DigiFarm to train it to that personality type.
  4. Put the Ankylomon and Angemon into the active party and start a battle.
  5. Use one of their DNA Digivolution Special Skills in battle and fuse into Shakkoumon .

Once Shakkoumon has been unlocked in the Field Guide, players should unlock the four Digivolution of Wisdom nodes in the Bonds of Wisdom Agent Skill tree . These four skills will allow players to take these actions:

  1. Digivolve the Angemon into MagnaAngemon .
  2. Digivolve the MagnaAngemon into Goldramon .
  3. De-digivolve the Goldramon into Shakkoumon .
  4. De-digivolve the Shakkoumon into Angemon , making sure the Angemon is set as primary.

Players will now find that they have an extra Ankylomon in their box , and they will receive another copy every time that they repeat the previous four steps. Players can then immediately load those Ankylomon copies into the desired Digimon, or they can do so after leveling them up if they prefer.

Scan Farming Method

For those players who prefer a more active approach, a good EXP farming option is to quickly accumulate 100% scans in order to convert a ton of fodder Digimon, which can be leveled up in the box and then loaded into desirable Digimon for fast levels. While there are many places to farm scans, the Shinjuku Underground Waterway: North Block is a great target. For full clarity, this area is accessed through the manhole in Shinjuku: A Certain Back Alley - 8 Years Ago , and here is how to farm scans there:

  1. Use DigiRide to summon your mount in Time Stranger .
  2. Run into every Digimon on the map. Most should be destroyed immediately, and it should only take one round to beat the rest.
  3. As soon as a scan hits 100%, convert it.
  4. After clearing the map, leave it and reenter to respawn all the Digimon.
  5. Repeat the previous steps to amass a ton of Digimon.
9.0 /10

Digimon Story: Time Stranger

item.title: Roblox: Labubu Trading Codes (October 2025)
item.description:
Labubu Trading is a Roblox game where you can obtain numerous cool collectibles that are not available in real life. Here, you can get them for game currency from boxes and then trade them with friends and random players. However, getting rare items will be difficult at first, especially if you are a beginner, so you will have to spend some Robux or grind a lot. Fortunately, you can also redeem Labubu Trading codes and get cool rewards for free.

All Labubu Trading Codes

Working Labubu Trading Codes

  • bubu2025 - Redeem this code to get x2 Legendary Boxes.
  • like500 - Redeem this code to get x2 Legendary Boxes.
  • like2k - Redeem this code to get x2 Legendary Boxes.

Expired Labubu Trading Codes

Currently, there are no expired codes at Labubu Trading . All codes are working, and you can receive rewards for them.

How to Redeem Codes in Labubu Trading

Redeeming codes is one of the simplest features in Roblox games, but the process can vary slightly depending on the game. Most often, you can find a visible button called “Codes” or “Redeem,” placed somewhere in the menu, shop, or settings. However, in Labubu Trading , you will not find this option in the interface. To open the code redemption window in Labubu Trading , you need to find a specific place in the location. If you are new to Roblox and not sure where to look, don’t worry, this guide will show you how to redeem codes in Labubu Trading :

  • Launch Roblox and open Labubu Trading .
  • Explore the location. Find the gift and enter the pink zone around it.
  • A code redemption window will appear. Paste the code from the list of working codes into the field and press the green Enter button.

Keep in mind that codes may expire over time, so redeem them as soon as possible to receive rewards.

How to Get More Labubu Trading Codes

Since Roblox codes appear frequently and expire quickly, it can be challenging to find new ones. We add every working code we find to this guide to make it easier. The best way to stay informed is to bookmark this page and return to it occasionally. Additionally, keep an eye on the developers' official social media accounts, as they frequently share new codes during events, maintenance, or giveaways. In this way, you'll never miss a freebie again, and you'll be among the first to learn about new rewards. Here's the official developer social platforms so you can stay informed:

  • Labubu Trading Roblox game page
  • Labubu Trading Roblox group
Roblox
446
8.8 /10
